info.name: Conduit API Tests
info.description:
Collection for testing the Conduit API

https://github.com/gothinkster/realworld

response.name: Register
Login

exec: tests['Environment variable "token" has been set'] = environment.token === user.token;

response.name: Login and Remember Token
Current User
Update User

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.createdAt).toISOString() === article.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.updatedAt).toISOString() === article.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests['articlesCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.articlesCount === 0;

response.name: Feed

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.createdAt).toISOString() === article.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.updatedAt).toISOString() === article.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests['articlesCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.articlesCount === 0;

tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests['articlesCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.articlesCount === 0;

response.name: Articles by Tag

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.createdAt).toISOString() === article.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.updatedAt).toISOString() === article.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);

response.name: Create Article

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.createdAt).toISOString() === article.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.updatedAt).toISOString() === article.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);

response.name: Single Article by slug

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.createdAt).toISOString() === article.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.updatedAt).toISOString() === article.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);

response.name: Update Article

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.createdAt).toISOString() === article.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.updatedAt).toISOString() === article.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests["Article's 'favorited' property is true"] = article.favorited === true;
tests["Article's 'favoritesCount' property is greater than 0"] = article.favoritesCount > 0;

response.name: Favorite Article

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.createdAt).toISOString() === article.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.updatedAt).toISOString() === article.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests["Article's \"favorited\" property is true"] = article.favorited === false;

response.name: Unfavorite Article

exec: tests['Article\'s "createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.createdAt).toISOString() === article.createdAt;
tests['Article\'s "updatedAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(article.updatedAt).toISOString() === article.updatedAt;
tests['Article\'s "tagList" property is an Array'] = Array.isArray(article.tagList);
tests['articlesCount is 0 when feed is empty'] = responseJSON.articlesCount === 0;

response.name: Single Article by slug

exec: tests['"createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(comment.createdAt).toISOString() === comment.createdAt;

response.name: All Comments for Article

exec: tests['"createdAt" property is an ISO 8601 timestamp'] = new Date(comment.createdAt).toISOString() === comment.createdAt;

response.name: Create Comment for Article
Profile

exec: tests['Profile\'s "following" property is true'] = profile.following === true;

response.name: Follow Profile

exec: tests['Profile\'s "following" property is false'] = profile.following === false;

response.name: Unfollow Profile

exec: tests['"tags" property returned as array'] = Array.isArray(responseJSON.tags);

response.name: All Tags
